2026-01-28.content: Customer Experience Insights offers [configurable dashboards](https://docs.cloud.google.com/contact-center/insights/docs/configurable-dashboards) to view usage and feedback metrics over time. Choose from a wide array of chart types to build your own, or use the AI assistant to build custom dashboards.

summary.title: New dashboards for customer feedback
summary.summary: Customer Experience Insights now provides configurable dashboards to track usage and feedback metrics. You can build your own dashboards using various chart types or leverage the AI assistant for quick setup. This feature helps you gain deeper insights into customer sentiment and operational efficiency.

2026-01-12.content: This product has a new name. The same product with the same features is now called Customer Experience Insights, or CX Insights for short.

summary.title: Customer Experience Insights (CX Insights) is here
summary.summary: We are excited to announce the launch of Customer Experience Insights, now known as CX Insights. This new name reflects the same great product and features you already know, focusing on delivering valuable customer insights.

2026-01-20.content: Customer Experience Insights offers [configurable dashboards](https://docs.cloud.google.com/contact-center/insights/docs/configurable-dashboards) to view usage and feedback metrics over time. Choose from a wide array of chart types to build your own, or use the AI assistant to build custom dashboards.

summary.title: New customizable dashboards in Contact Center AI Insights
summary.summary: Contact Center AI Insights now provides configurable dashboards to visualize usage and feedback metrics. Users can build custom dashboards using various chart types or leverage the AI assistant for quick setup.

2025-09-17.content:
Conversational Insights offers the following subscriptions:

* **Standard edition** provides a suite of tools to analyze customer service conversations.
* **Enterprise edition** includes the standard edition tools and Quality AI.
* **Standalone Quality AI** provides only automated evaluation tools.

[Pricing](https://cloud.google.com/contact-center/insights/docs/pricing) is based on how you interact with your customers:

* **Chat** conversations are billed per message.
* **Voice** conversations are billed per minute.

summary.title: Conversational Insights: New Edition Options
summary.summary: Conversational Insights now offers Standard and Enterprise editions, alongside the Standalone Quality AI option. Pricing varies based on chat messages or voice minutes.

2025-08-15.content:
Quality AI offers the virtual agent platformÂ to help with quality management for virtual agents. The [virtual agent platform](https://cloud.google.com/contact-center/insights/docs/virtual-agent-platform) presents data for the following metrics, aggregated across all an agent's conversations:

* Rate of escalation to a human agent
* Latencies with respect to operations that an agent performs
* Customer sentiments

summary.title: Quality AI Virtual Agent Platform
summary.summary: Quality AI's virtual agent platform helps with quality management for virtual agents.

2025-08-15.content: Conversational Insights offers conversation **datasets** in preview. Choose from your existing history or upload new conversations to curate customized [datasets](https://cloud.google.com/contact-center/insights/docs/datasets) to test and evaluate the results of Agent Assist summarization.

summary.title: New Dataset Feature
summary.summary: Conversational Insights now offers conversation datasets in preview. You can use your existing history or upload new conversations to create customized datasets for testing and evaluating Agent Assist summarization.

2025-07-18.content: Quality AI offers **multiple scorecards** in preview. With [multiple scorecards](https://cloud.google.com/contact-center/insights/docs/qai-basics#scorecards), Quality AI can evaluate a single conversation against different criteria and provide multiple conversation scores. You can also choose which scorecard data to view on each page of the console.

summary.title: Quality AI introduces multiple scorecards
summary.summary: Quality AI now supports multiple scorecards, allowing you to evaluate conversations against different criteria and generate various scores. You can customize the scorecard data displayed in the console.

2025-06-27.content: Quality AI offers the [**agent engagement platform**](https://cloud.google.com/contact-center/insights/docs/agent-engagement) where contact center personnel can visualize agent performance data, including an AI-generated summary. The agent engagement platform also identifies areas where an agent excels and needs help compared to their peers.

Qualilty AI offers agent [**assessments**](https://cloud.google.com/contact-center/insights/docs/conversation-assessments) based on individual conversations. Human evaluators can also add notes to these assessments with feedback for the agent.

summary.title: New feedback feature for agent assessments
summary.summary: Agent assessments can now include notes and feedback from human evaluators, offering more detailed insights into individual conversations.

2025-06-27.content: Quality AI offers [**sampling rules**](https://cloud.google.com/contact-center/insights/docs/assessment-rules) that filter conversations to reduce the workload for human evaluators, saving contact centers time and money.

summary.title: New sampling rules for Quality AI
summary.summary: Quality AI provides sampling rules to filter conversations, which helps reduce the workload for human evaluators and saves money for contact centers.

2025-06-27.content: Add your own **custom tags** in [Quality AI](https://cloud.google.com/contact-center/insights/docs/qai-basics). In addition to the default Business, Compliance and Customer tags, you can apply custom tags to any question in any scorecard.

summary.title: Custom tags in Quality AI
summary.summary: You can now add custom tags in Quality AI. In addition to the default tags, you can apply custom tags to any question in any scorecard.

2025-06-27.content:
Conversational Insights offers a [devkit](https://cloud.google.com/contact-center/insights/docs/python-library-for-developers) to help developers and maintainers perform a wide range of actions, including the following:

* Import one or more conversations with metadata.
* Transcribe mono audio files.
* Create recognizers with STT V2.
* Transform transcript data formats from Genesys Cloud or AWS.
* Change Conversational Insights global settings.

summary.title: New Developer Kit for Conversational Insights
summary.summary: Conversational Insights now provides a developer kit to help with importing conversations, transcribing audio, creating recognizers, transforming data, and managing settings.

2025-06-20.content: Conversational Insights offers **sentiment analysis** in GA. [Sentiment analysis](https://cloud.google.com/contact-center/insights/docs/sentiment) determines the mood within a conversation and assigns a score: positive, neutral, or negative.

summary.title: Sentiment Analysis Now Available in Google Analytics
summary.summary: The new update allows you to see the sentiment of your customer conversations in Google Analytics. This feature can help you understand customer satisfaction by analyzing the mood of your conversations and assigning a score of positive, neutral, or negative.

2025-05-29.content: Conversational Insights offers a **merged analysis**, which displays the previous results of each analysis type alongside your most recent analysis result. Merged analysis eliminates the need to run every analysis multiple times.

summary.title: Merged Analysis for Conversational Insights
summary.summary: This feature provides a merged analysis, displaying previous and current analysis results together. This eliminates the need to run analyses multiple times.
